song.title: Suburbia / High Hopes
song.info:
basehead / kosmic $#@! in 1995 order 00-63 = suburbia, order 64-113 = high hopes
hey! this is bh comin atcha once again, wif another kos release .. this one starts out with a sort-of oldskool deephouse groove, and then mixes in halfway thru to a huge overhaul/remix of the classic "high-on-hope" from the berlin 1992 compilation
the first part is complete and original, and the 2nd introduces some loops from mijk van dijk himself, the guy behind the brilliance of microglobe and mindgear. anyways, enough small talk. hope you like the track !!!
-bh95!-kosmic/fm/imphobia-
greets 4 samples: vein melter (cd), microglobe (cd), x-static goldmine (cd), liberty city (cd), illusion (cd), the orb (cd), godbrain/northstar, pitty/dytec, bit/eon, sampleman/spacecake greets out to: necros.fm/legend design, ryan cramer.renaissance, khyron.kosmic, lord pegasus.kosmic (!!!!!), stalker.otm (podnah!), maelcum.kosmic (dork =) =), chromatic dragon.bass, everyone on the OTHER #trax
===((SEE YA NEXT TIME!))===
